scripts.aws:dev: npm run build:clean && aws s3 cp --recursive ./build/ s3://staging.conceal.cloud/ --profile=conceal --cache-control max-age=30 --metadata-directive REPLACE
scripts.aws:prod: npm run build:clean && aws s3 cp --recursive ./build/ s3://conceal.cloud/ --profile=conceal --cache-control max-age=30 --metadata-directive REPLACE && npm run aws:invalidate
scripts.aws:invalidate: aws configure set preview.cloudfront true --profile=conceal && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --profile=conceal --distribution-id E1GRNOKTY1DVG --paths / && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --profile=conceal --distribution-id E1GRNOKTY1DVG --paths /index.html
